events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the engineering department due to the candidate's experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to follow up with the candidate and coordinate the next steps.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, during which the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development fundamentals.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for moving forward with the technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate, set for the following week with the engineering leads.
The candidate completed the technical interview, showcasing excellent problem-solving skills and solid knowledge of software engineering.
Following the successful technical interview, an HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture and candidate expectations.
